Class CcddUndoHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddUndoHandler
public class CcddUndoHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary undoable components handler class

  • Method Details

    • setFieldHandler

      protected void setFieldHandler(CcddFieldHandler fieldHandler)
      Set the reference to the data field handler. This allows changes to the contents of a data field that is subsequently deleted, then restored via an undo, to retain the undo capability for the content changes
      Parameters:
      fieldHandler - Reference to the data field handler; null to not retain data field content changes following deletion and restoration of the field

    • setTable

      protected void setTable(CcddJTableHandler table)
      Set the reference to the table for which node selection changes are to be tracked
      Parameters:
      table - Reference to the table for which node selection changes are to be tracked

    • setSelectedCells

      protected void setSelectedCells(CcddClassesComponent.CellSelectionHandler selectedCells)

      Parameters:

    • setTree

      Set the reference to the tree for which node selection changes are to be tracked
      Parameters:
      tree - Reference to the tree for which node selection changes are to be tracked

    • setAllowUndo

      protected void setAllowUndo(boolean allow)
      Set the flag that allows registering an edit with the undo manager
      Parameters:
      allow - True to allow edits to be stored for possible undo action; false to perform the edit, but without storing it

    • isAllowUndo

      protected boolean isAllowUndo()
      Get the flag that allows registering an edit with the undo manager
      Returns:
      True if edits are stored for possible undo action; false to if edits are performed without storing it

    • setAutoEndEditSequence

      protected void setAutoEndEditSequence(boolean autoEndEdit)
      Set the flag that automatically ends an edit sequence. This flag is used by the group manager, link manager, and the data field editor panel so that multiple group/link/field changes are stored as a single edit rather than a number of individual edits; if the edit is undone then the changes are restored in a single operation. This flag is not used in the undoable table model and table column model classes
      Parameters:
      autoEndEdit - True to automatically end an edit sequence when a new edit operation occurs

    • isAutoEndEditSequence

      protected boolean isAutoEndEditSequence()
      Get the status of the flag that indicates if an edit sequence should be automatically ended. This flag is not used in the undoable table model and table column model classes
      Returns:
      True if the edit sequence is ended automatically; false if automatic ending is suspended

    • setComponentFocus

      private void setComponentFocus(JComponent comp)
      Set the focus to the specified component, without generating a new edit event
      Parameters:
      comp - JComponent to which to set the focus
